Vulnerability.Name: Use of weak cryptographic hashing algorithm
Vulnerability.Description: The application uses MD5 or SHA1 which are considered cryptographically broken.
Vulnerability.Recommandation: Use SHA-256 or stronger hashing algorithms.

Vulnerability.Name: Hardcoded secret in source code
Vulnerability.Description: Sensitive information: passwords, API keys or tokens are stored in the environment variables!
Vulnerability.Recommandation: Store secrets in Vaults, secure configuration systems or environment variables!

Vulnerability.Name: Hardcoded secret in source code
